name: Duel of honor
description:
The first of its kind 2D duel that takes you into the world of fierce battles on deadly airbikes. Destroy all your opponents in a variety of modes, passing through the thorns to the stars and winning the glory of the lord of air duels in the deadly arena

Features of the game:

- more than 3 game modes

- battle with bosses

- unique aerobike flight system

- the opportunity to get a unique game armor

The game will take you into the atmosphere of a fierce and hard struggle for the title of champion of BATTLEDUEL
